Bibliographic Ghosts:
Oxford, Lincoln College Lat. 52; (listed with question mark in Brown and Robbins (1943)
XCarleton Fairchild Brown, and Rossell Hope Robbins. The Index of Middle English Verse. New York: Printed for the Index Society by Columbia University Press, 1943)
_description: Three lines in the Fasciculus morum translating the divisio of a Latin sermon for the Feast of St. John the Evangelist

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
In hert clene & buxumIn speche myld & louesomIn dede fre
                    & gladsom

BodLauMis568.Transcription:
in hert clene & buxumin speche myld & louesome& in
                    dede fre & gladdsomme

Bod187.Transcription:
In hert clene and buxumIn speche mylde and louesomIn dede fre
                    and gladsum

Bod332.Transcription:
In hert clene & buxomin speche mylde & lussomIn dede fre
                    & gladsom

OxfCCC218.Transcription:
In herte clene and buxomIn speche mylde and louesemIn dede fre
                    and gladsem

                    fre & gladsom
